page.title: 11 AMENITIES.
page.content: {NORTH DEVON HOSPITAL } The hospital was built in 1976.It was opened by the Duke of Kent .By the side of the Hospital there is a Maternity dep.That was built in 1986. There are fourteen wards and about 1000 people work there.There is a new place being built called David Berrly dep.Which will have 30 beds the total of beds will then be 430 beds. {NORTH DEVON HEALTH CENTRE The health centre was built around { {1974}and 1975.There are 14 doctors,seven for the Tiverton region and seven for the North Devon region. {ROSE BANK OLD PEOPLES HOME} There are 36 residents living there with 24 staff looking after them.There isnt any room for the Staff to live there.The rooms are 9 Double and 13 singles.It was built 22 years ago by Devon County Council.
